projectstats 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

    Builds and sends the email

    build_email.Rd

    This function compiles the tables with some email text and sends it using blastula::smtp_send.

    build_email(from_, to_, creds, body_, table_iss, table_pr, footer_)

    Arguments

    from_

    sender email address

    to_

    recipient email address

    creds

    A credential file of the type supported by codeblastula

    body_

    The text to precede the table

    table_iss

    the issue table

    table_pr

    The PR table

    footer_

    the text to follow the table

    Value

    the email body

    See also

    blastula::creds

    Contents

    Developed by Christine Stawitz.
